column1: # CardDemo Card Cross-Reference Test Data (CSV Format)

column2: and JPA association mappings in Spring Boot microservices.

column1: # This CSV file supports comprehensive testing scenarios for:
# - Card-to-account relationship validation and cross-reference queries
# - PostgreSQL foreign key constraint testing with complex relationship scenarios
# - Spring Batch cross-reference data processing for relationship validation testing
# - JPA association mappings and cross-reference queries in microservices architecture
# Data Structure:
# - card_number: 16-digit card identifier (VARCHAR(16) PRIMARY KEY)
# - account_id: 11-digit account identifier (VARCHAR(11) FOREIGN KEY -> accounts.account_id)
# - customer_id: 9-digit customer identifier (VARCHAR(9) FOREIGN KEY -> customers.customer_id)
# - relationship_type: Cross-reference relationship type (PRIMARY
# - active_status: Cross-reference active status (Y/N for compatibility with COBOL data)
# - creation_date: Cross-reference creation date (YYYY-MM-DD format)
# - last_updated: Last update timestamp (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format)
# - notes: Additional notes for test scenario identification
# Test Scenarios Included:
# 1. Valid card-to-account relationships with proper foreign key references
# 2. Multiple cards per account testing composite relationships
# 3. Single card per customer testing one-to-one relationships
# 4. Cross-reference constraint validation test cases
# 5. Edge cases for orphaned references and constraint violation testing
# 6. Inactive relationship testing for lifecycle management
# 7. Date-based relationship testing for temporal queries
# 8. Bulk relationship testing for Spring Batch processing validation
# COBOL Field Mappings (from cardxref.txt):
# - Original positions 1-16: card_number (16 digits)
# - Original positions 17-27: account_id (11 digits)
# - Original positions 28-38: customer_id (derived from account relationship)
# - Additional fields: Enhanced for comprehensive testing coverage
# Technical Specification References:
# - Section 6.2.6.6: Card-to-account cross-reference functionality
# - Section 6.2.1.3: Foreign key constraint validation requirements
# - Section 6.6.3.2: Integration testing with PostgreSQL Testcontainers
# - Section 2.1.4: Card-to-account cross-referencing per business requirements
# @author Blitzy agent
# @version CardDemo_v1.0-15-g27d6c6f-68
# @source app/data/ASCII/cardxref.txt (migrated from VSAM CARDXREF dataset)
# CSV Header with comprehensive field definitions
